details.title: STEM and Business Calculus
details.description: Designed and prepared class material including lectures notes, activities, homework, quizzes, and exam questions. Directed classtime lectures and groupwork several times a week, in-person and online. Managed a grader who was responsible for meeting deadlines and quality standards.

points.point: Designed and prepared class material including lecture notes, presentations, activities, homework, and exams.
Presented material in traditional lecture and reverse-classroom environments.
Managed grader's time and quality of work. Communicated constructive feedback for helping them manage their efforts.

company: Johns Hopkins Center for Talented Youth

details.title: Cryptology
details.description: Designed and implemented several three-week long courses in Cryptology for middle school aged students. Created experiences that were challenging and fun for a wide range of abilities. Worked with a diverse set of staff and students to help make their summer camp a positive experience. Wrote personalized evaluations for each student focusing on their accomplishments and growth. Ended each session with a parent-instructor conference.

points.point: Designed, implemented, and instructed several three-week long courses in Cryptology for gifted middle school age students.
Wrote personalized evaluations for each student focusing on their accomplishments and growth.
